price: 当正道降临众人的时候，妨碍他们归信的只是他们的这句话：“难道安拉派遣一个凡人来做使者吗？”
arabic: وَمَا مَنَعَ ٱلنَّاسَ أَن يُؤۡمِنُوٓاْ إِذۡ جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡهُدَىٰٓ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُوٓاْ أَبَعَثَ ٱللَّهُ بَشَرٗا رَّسُولٗا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: wamā manaʿa al-nāsa an yu'minū idh jāahumu al-hudā illā an qālū abaʿatha al-lahu basharan rasūlan
